title: General data protection regulation/location history
content: Hi I'm trying to find contact information for Google so I can obtain my location history of call logs I made I cannot find information for your data protection officer in accordance with the general data protection regulation I already know your exact location is recorded for every call you make weather location is on or off I'm actually trying to save my own life by obtaining this information from Google as I have had a very similar experience to Dr Rashid abbassi and his wife with Northumbria police this police force in my experience cannot be trusted in any way shape or form so Google how do I get my location history from my call logs from you
